name: CITY OF MISSION, TEXAS
description: MUNICIPALITY OF THE STATE OF TEXAS AND THE USA
sampleDescriptions: ADDRESS ISSUES SURROUNDING A PRESIDENTIAL PERMIT FOR AN INTERNATIONAL CROSSING AT THE BORDER BETWEEN MISSION AND MEXICO
